Favored Weapon: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Morningstar]{Morningstar}

The Order of the Godclawâ€™s Hellknights see their cause as a holy mandate from the Godclaw. They seek to punish criminals with a zeal rarely matched by others who enforce the law.
